item.description: TEST ONLY; INC#0000; 02:45PM; Test ONLY;; Test. Test Only. LAFD Systems Test. No Action Required. Test Complete; West Bureau; LAFD Admin

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0698; 11:20AM; 9101 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OY6j4i; #GramercyPark; One-story row of commercials, smoke showing. First-arriving companies located a fire inside, burning contents only, and quickly extinguished the flames in 13 minutes before involving any structural components. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC4 E233 E264 E64 E66 E95 RA66 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Multi-Patient Traffic; INC#0912; 02:45PM; NB 405 Fwy x Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Je6Kpq; #Brentwood; A total of 4 LAFD ambulances transported one or more patients (each) to a local hospital.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; E109 E99 RA102 RA39 RA78 RA862 RA88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic; INC#0912; 01:35PM; NB 405 Fwy x Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Je6Kpq; #Brentwood; At least two vehicles collided, resulting in 7 patients (conditions: 1 serious, 1 moderate, 5 fair). One LAFD paramedic ambulance transported to the hospital (with possibly multiple patients, final # transported unconfirmed). Traffic has been negatively impacted in both directions of travel on the 405 freeway. CHP Log 1280. Nothing further.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; E109 E99 RA102 RA39 RA78 RA862 RA88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

#LATraffic - Structure Fire ; INC#0226; 05:33AM; 5249 W Century Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OFvdF3; #Westchester - #LAX Area; Los Angeles Firefighters have safely extinguished a non-injury fire in the parking structure of a hotel near Century Boulevard and La Cienega Blvd at 5:48 this morning. Spectator slowing and the presence of fire apparatus blocking nearby lanes of both Century and La Cienega Boulevards, has led to considerable traffic in the area. Motorists headed to Los Angeles International Airport before 8:00 AM today should anticipate congestion in that area, and consider an alternate route to LAX. LAFD operations should be complete by 8:00 AM. Please monitor traffic reports on news radio.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC4 E205 E295 E5 E51 E95 RA857 RA95 T5 T95; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1715; 11:42PM; 5844 N Craner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cNUPm5; #NorthHollywood; *Address Corrected* to 5844 Craner. 36 Firefighters took just 21 minutes of well coordinated offensive firefighting operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a vacant and partially boarded 2,418 square foot L-shaped one story home (built 1936). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E288 E289 E60 E86 E89 RA60 RA860 T60 T88 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1715; 11:21PM; 5847 N Craner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S4XJTj; #NorthHollywood; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Offensive firefight at vacant one story home with heavy fire showing.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E60 E86 RA60 RA860 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1311; 07:18PM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aPmUFx; #SepulvedaBasin; Thanks to precise water drops from a pair of quickly arriving LAFD helicopters, forward progress of the fire/s has been stopped in just 50 minutes. The 40 ground-based LAFD firefighters are finalizing control of the perimeter of the blaze with hand tools and hose lines. No final acreage estimate is available. No injury. No structures damaged. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC14 E100 E109 E239 E288 E290 E81 E88 E90 E99 EM14 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA83 T39 T88 T90 WT88; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1311; 06:28PM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aPmUFx; #SepulvedaBasin; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to several spot fires in volatile light-to-medium density brush south of Burbank Boulevard. No road closure. No structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC14 E100 E109 E239 E288 E290 E81 E88 E90 E99 EM14 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA83 T39 T88 T90 WT88; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1158; 04:47PM; 13750 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zy7qCK; #PanoramaCity; PRELIM: Pickup Truck towing a concrete pumping trailer entered a gas station, striking three vehicles, knocking over one fuel pump and causing 11 persons (6 adults / 5 children) to sustain minor injuries. No fire. No entrapment. Minor fuel spill on premises only. Four of the patients have declined offered ambulance transportation. The remaining seven ( unknown age / gender / affiliation ) will be taken to area hospitals for further evaluation of their non-life threatening injuries. No street or lane closures. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3253).; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E290 E81 RA81 RA881 RA891 T90; CH8; Brian Humphrey
